coded_answer.p: The porpousepurpose of this letter is to complain about my experience with the musical show "Over the Rainbow", wichwhich really disapointeddisappointed me.

First of all, there were no diccountsdiscounts avaibleavailable such as it saidwere promised onin the anouncementannouncementadvertisement so I had to pay the original price wichwhich wasn't cheap at all.

Then, I was forced to wait fourty fiveforty fiveforty-five minutes to see the show because it started at 20:75 in steadinstead of 19:30 and, when it finally started, I was really disapointeddisappointed to see that the actors weren't Danny and Tina as it saidhad said onin the anouncementannouncementadvertisement.
Finally, when the show finished, I couldn't visit the theatre restaurant because it was closed for repairs.
So, as you can see, it wasn't my perfect evening out at all that's. That's why I demand you to sendsend me my money back.
How has modern technology afectedaffected my daily life?

Since the beginingbeginning of human life, people have invented ways to make their lifelives easier. That is not differencedifferent from now. We live sorroundedsurrounded by inventions wichwhich help as through the day.
From the vehicle we use to move faster to the light bulb we use at night, we constantly dependsdepend on these inventions to be able to makedo the things we have to do.

That's why modern technology is so important in our daily lifelives, because it helps to make our lifelives easiesteasier and to do what we have to do faster so then we can use better our timeour time better.
